column4: which is weird... even the windows 7 and vista boxes show the error with canonical at the bottom
which proxy you have?
no proxy... DHCP connection to verizon dsl
or do you think ubuntu loaded one up?
check proxy settings in your browser.
is it firefox?
yes in ubuntu.... chrome in windows 7... IE in Vista
you have problem on all three machines?
go to firefox menu: Edit > Preferences - Network tab
its on use system proxy
what is on "use" system proxy?
the setting.. I switched to no proxy and that didn't solve... cleared cache and now its all groovy
groove == work?
yeah
any ideas what the heck happened or why canonical would be on the bottom of an error on a windows vista box? hehehe
glad to hear that... their proxy is down.
i dont know, you didnt set it up to use that proxy?
eh? who's proxy is down?
that one that you were using....
there were a few boxes... one was no proxy.. one was system proxy... and then there was another radio button
which one was check when you opened it?
